verses.text: Ha in tik, niwan val ix aj vab'an syail yuj yoval sk'ol Dios.
Ix in spechb'at t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal b'aj junelnhej k'ik'olinac. Ix in yak' b'ey t'a yoltac b'e b'aj malaj sakil k'inal.
Masanil k'u ichanhej tik in smak'an yet' yoval sk'ool.
Ix yak' ichamax in nivanil, chok'xonhej ix yutejcanb'at in b'aquil.
Ix in smacchej yet' yaelal yet' cusk'olal.
Ix in yak' aj t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal, icha yaj eb' chamnacxo.
Ix in smacchej b'aj manhxa b'aj syal veli. Yed' val q'uen nivac cadena ix in stzek'a'.
Wach'chom tz'el vav in k'anan scolval, max scha yab' tas tzin k'an t'ay.
Ix smac in b'e yet' q'uen q'ueen, yuj chi' axonhej t'a q'uex b'e tzin b'ati.
Lajan ix yutej sb'a Jehová t'ayin icha junok nok' oso sk'ub'ejel sb'a, icha junok nok' choj tz'elta jucnaj t'ayin.
Ix in snherel t'a yol b'e yic chok' tzin yutejcanb'ati, ix in actajcan yuj.
Ix sb'o'och sjul-lab', ix kan ijan t'ayin yet' sjul-lab' chi'.
Ha sjul-lab' ix sjulcot t'ayin, ix k'axpaj t'a yol in k'ool.
Masanil eb' vetanimail sb'uchvaj t'ayin, a inxonhej tzin yal eb' t'a skal slolonel.
D'a val syaelal ix in ajek' yuj Dios. Te k'a' tas ix yak' vuq'uej.
Ix el vecnaj q'uen ve ayic ix in em latnaj t'a sat lum yuj, ix in kan telan t'a cal pococ.
Manhxalaj in junk'olal, manhxo naanoc tzalajk'olal vuuj.
Svalani to manhxa in tek'anil, yujto manhxo ayococh Jehová yipoc in k'ool.
Ha tzin naancot in cuselal yet' vek' in ch'ocojil, te ya svab'i.
Ha val yic tzin naancot juntzanh chi', manhxo animaoc tzin aj svab'i.
Palta ay jun tas tzin nib'ej, aynhejek' t'a in pensar, aton jun chi' in gana svak'nhejoch yipoc in k'ool.
Aton val yuj svach'k'olal Jehová max onh sateli, yujto tz'ok'nhej sk'ool t'ayonh.
Junjun q'uinhib'alil scheclaj svach'k'olal Jehová, syalnhej cak'anoch t'a co k'ool.
Yuj chi' svala' to icha in macb'en yaj Jehová, anhej ayoch yipoc in k'ool.
Ha eb' tz'ak'anoch Jehová t'a sk'ool, te wach' Jehová chi' t'a eb', aton eb' to sb'ec val och sb'ha t'a yol sk'ab'.
Te wach' tato numan tzonh aj co tanhvani masanto scolvaj Jehová t'ayonh.
Yelxo wach' tato ayic unin animaonhto scak'anoch co b'ha t'a yalanh smandar Dios.
Wach' tato numan tzonh aj co ch'ocoj yacb'an syak'och co yaelal Jehová.
Yovalil tzonh och ejmelal, tzonh em nhojan t'a sat lu'um, talaj tz'ok' sk'ol Jehová t'ayonh.
Wach'chom tzonh mak'ji, tzonh b'uchji, palta co chaocab'i.
Max onh yactejcan Jehová t'a junelnhej.
Wach'chom syak'och co yaelal, palta tz'ok'pax sk'ool t'ayonh, yujto te niwan svach'k'olal.
Val yel malaj sgana syak'och co cusk'olal yet' co yaelal.
Ha Jehová Dios Axonhej Ochi, malaj sgana tz'ixtaj eb' anima t'a preso,
malaj pax sgana tz'ik'jiel sderecho eb' ak'b'il yuj.
Manh wach'oc t'a sat Dios tato max ch'olb'itaj eb' anima t'a stojolal.
Max elk'ochlaj tas sco na' tato manhoc Jehová tz'alani.
Max javilaj wach'ilal ma yaelal, tato manhoc Dios Axonhej Och tz'alani.
¿Tas yuj chuc scab'i tato yuj co chucal syak' co yaelal Dios?
Co b'eyk'olejec val co b'a sik'lab'il, chajtil yilji co b'eyb'al, scak'anxioch co b'ha t'a yol sk'ab' Jehová.
Caq'uecb'at co pensar d'ha Dios aj satcha’anh, scalan t'a co lesal icha tik:
Ix och co mul, ix co pitej co b'a t'ayach, maj onh ak' nivank'olal.
Ix javi yoval a k'ol t'ayonh, ix onh a pechani, ix onh a sateli, majxo ok'laj a k'ool t'ayonh.
Ix a k'ub'ejel a b'a, najat ach b'atcan t'ayonh yic maxtzac ab' co lesal.
Icha k'alem ix onh utej t'a skal masanil anima.
Masanil eb' cajk'ool, ix onh sb'uchval eb'.
Tzonh te xivi yujto a eb' ajk'ol t'ayonh tzonh syam eb', tzonh yixtan eb', tzonh satanel eb', xco chi.
Tz'el val jiljon yal in sat vok' yuj cusk'olal, yujto van satel eb' vetchonhab'.
Manh ol vactej vok' yuj vab'annhej syail
masanto ol yak'cot svach'k'olal Jehová t'ayonh t'a satcha’anh.
Te yaxo pax svab' yet' in pixan yuj tas tzek' t'a yib'anh eb' ix ix t'a yol in chonhab'.
Ha eb' ajk'ool, tzin spech eb' wach'chom malaj jab'oc in mul. Icha tz'aj spechji junok nok' much icha chi' tzin yutej eb'.
Pitzan in val ix in syumanem eb' t'a yol jun jul, ix smacancan sti' jun jul chi' eb' yet' jun q'uen q'ueen, manhxa b'aj syal veli.
Ichato ay in em t'a yol ha ha', ix in naani to yicxo chamel vaji.
Mamin Jehová, ato t'a sjulal yich jun jul tik tzin avaj t'ayach.
Ab' yoch in jaj, manh actej ab'an in tevi.
Ix a nitzcot a b'a t'ayin ayic ix ach vavtani, ix alan t'ayin: Manh ach xivoc, xa chi.
Mamin, ix in a colcanel t'a yol sk'ab' chamel.
Mamin Jehová, ojtac tas tzin utaj t'a manh stojolaloc tik. B'o yaj t'ayin t'a stojolal.
Ojtac tas snib'ej eb' ajk'ol t'ayin yet' tas sna eb' tzin yutej.
Mamin Jehová, ix ab' jantac chucal syal eb' t'a in patic yet' jantac tas sna eb' tzin yutej.
Jun k'u syak' eb' in yalub'tanhani, snaan eb' tas ol in yutoc.
Ilnab' val, k'ual t'ak'val in sb'uchan eb'.
Mamin Jehová, ak' spac t'a eb' icha val smojalil yuj tas tzin yutej.
Ak' pitb'oquel spensar eb', tzak'anb'at catab' t'a yib'anh eb'.
Mamin, pech eb' yet' yoval a k'ool. Satel eb' t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
